thread.title: Over 520 000 migrants crossed the Mediterranean this year
thread.title_full: Over 520 000 migrants crossed the Mediterranean this year | News24

author: news24.com
title: Over 520 000 migrants crossed the Mediterranean this year
text:
Rome/Brussels - About 522 000 migrants have made the dangerous crossing across the Mediterranean so far this year, the International Organisation for Migration (IOM) reported on Tuesday in Geneva.
More than 388 000 of them went by boat from Turkey to Greece, while 131 000 ventured from Northern Africa to Italy.
Smaller numbers have arrived in Spain and Malta.
"Even if arrivals are still increasing, it is necessary to emphasise that this in not an emergency in terms of numbers," IOM director general William Lacy Swing said in New York, pointing to the 4 million Syrian refugees being hosted by Middle Eastern countries and Turkey.
